alert.note: Alert for Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 22 at 6:57PM EDT until July 22 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Tornado Warning for portions of... Berkeley County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 656 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Saint Stephen, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include: Saint Stephen and Jamestown. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
